headline: Amcor plc (AMCR) Falls to Its 52-Week Low at $8.15 per share; RBC Capital Initiates Coverage with Sector Perform Rating and $9.00 PT
summary: Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) is one of the 20 NYSE Stocks with the Lowest P/E Ratios. Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) fell to its 52-week low at $8.15 per share on September 23, 2025, despite the packaging behemoth’s ongoing integration of its Berry purchase. Reporting low double-digit revenue growth, the $19 billion company, which has increased its dividend […]
